lines.text: This is the first test line. Hello world.
This is the second test line. Hello world.
This is the THIRD test line. New set, here.
This is the fourth test line. I am dead inside.
Maybe in one instance, I'm telling the truth.
Maybe in another, I'm a stinky liar.
Go away... stinky. Poopy stinko. Nobody wants you here, you know.
